citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 330 pm on
06-Jun-17.
Owner did answer phone, but was not home. With family at at ballgame.
